mapper.select: SELECT gender, COUNT(CASE WHEN gender = '남' THEN 1 END) AS maleCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN gender = '여' THEN 1 END) AS femaleCount FROM user GROUP BY gender;
SELECT DATE(active) AS day, COUNT(*) AS count FROM user GROUP BY DATE(active) order by day ASC;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(active, '%Y-%m') AS month, COUNT(*) AS count1 FROM user GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(active, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY month ASC;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(active, '%Y') AS year, COUNT(*) AS count2 FROM user GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(active, '%Y') ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT userId,name,address,phone,email,gender,birthday,howToLogin,active,deactive FROM user;
SELECT userId, name, address, phone, email, gender, birthday, howToLogin, active, deactive FROM user WHERE active LIKE CONCAT(#{active}, '%')
SELECT userId, name, address, phone, email, gender, birthday, howToLogin, active, deactive FROM user WHERE deactive LIKE CONCAT(#{deactive}, '%')
SELECT proName, SUM(proQty) AS totalQty FROM product where prodelDate is null GROUP BY proName;

SELECT pr.proName, SUM(p.pQty) AS totalQuantity, ROUND((SUM(p.pQty) / (SELECT SUM(pQty) FROM purchase)) * 100, 2) AS percentage FROM purchase p INNER JOIN Product pr ON p.proseq = pr.proseq GROUP BY pr.proName ORDER BY pr.proName
SELECT proCategory,proName,proGender,proIntroduction,proColor,proQty,proPrice,proDate,proImage1,proImage2,proImage3 FROM product;
SELECT proCategory,proName,proGender,proIntroduction,proColor,proQty,proPrice,proDate,proImage1,proImage2,proImage3 FROM product WHERE proDate LIKE CONCAT(#{proDate}, '%')
SELECT purchase.pDate, SUM(purchase.pPrice) AS total_pPrice FROM purchase GROUP BY purchase.pDate order by pDate ASC
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(purchase.pDate, '%Y-%m') AS month_date, SUM(purchase.pPrice) AS total_pPrice FROM purchase GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(purchase.pDate, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY month_date ASC
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(purchase.pDate, '%Y') AS year_date, SUM(purchase.pPrice) AS total_pPrice FROM purchase GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(purchase.pDate, '%Y') ORDER BY year_date ASC

SELECT product.proCategory, product.proName, product.proGender, product.proColor, purchase.pQty, purchase.pPrice, purchase.pMethod, purchase.pDate FROM purchase INNER JOIN product ON purchase.proseq = product.proseq

SELECT product.proCategory, product.proName, product.proGender, product.proColor, purchase.pQty, purchase.pPrice, purchase.pMethod, purchase.pDate FROM purchase INNER JOIN product ON purchase.proseq = product.proseq WHERE ${query} LIKE #{content}

SELECT product.proCategory, product.proName, product.proGender, product.proColor, purchase.pQty, purchase.pPrice, purchase.pMethod, purchase.pDate FROM purchase INNER JOIN product ON purchase.proseq = product.proseq WHERE pDate LIKE CONCAT(#{pDate}, '%')
SELECT product.proGender, SUM(purchase.pPrice) AS total_pPrice FROM product INNER JOIN purchase ON product.proseq = purchase.proseq GROUP BY product.proGender
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (proCategory, proName, proGender, proIntroduction, proColor, proQty, proPrice, proDate, proImage1, proImage2, proImage3) VALUES (#{proCategory}, #{proName}, #{proGender}, #{proIntroduction}, #{proColor}, #{proQty}, #{proPrice}, now(), #{proImage1}, #{proImage2}, #{proImage3})
mapper.select: SELECT proSeq, proCategory, proName, proGender, proIntroduction, proColor, proQty, proPrice,proImage1,proImage2,proImage3,proDate FROM product
SELECT proSeq, proCategory, proName, proGender, proIntroduction, proColor, proQty, proPrice,proImage1,proImage2,proImage3,proDate FROM product WHERE proDate LIKE CONCAT(#{proDate}, '%')
SELECT * FROM product WHERE proSeq = #{proSeq}

SELECT min(proSeq) as proSeq, proName, min(proPrice) as proPrice,min(proImage1) as proImage1,min(proImage2) as proImage2, sum(proQty) as totalProQty FROM product WHERE proCategory = 'All-in-one' group by proName

SELECT min(proSeq) as proSeq, proName, min(proPrice) as proPrice, min(proImage1) as proImage1, min(proImage2) as proImage2,min(proImage3) as proImage3,min(proIntroduction) as proIntroduction,sum(proQty) as proQty FROM product WHERE proName=#{proName} group by proName
SELECT DISTINCT proColor FROM product WHERE proName=#{proName}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (userId, noTitle, noCategory, noContent, noImage, noDate) values (#{userId}, #{noTitle}, #{noCategory}, #{noContent}, #{noImage}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice WHERE noSeq = #{noSeq}
SELECT * FROM qna WHERE qnaSeq = #{qnaSeq}
mapper.insert: insert into qna (userId, qnaTitle, qnaCategory, qnaContent, qnaImage, qnaDate,parents1) values (#{userId}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaCategory}, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaImage}, now(),"0")
mapper.select: SELECT qnaSeq,userId,qnaTitle,qnaCategory,qnaContent,qnaDate FROM qna WHERE ${query} LIKE #{content} ORDER BY qnaSeq DESC
mapper.insert: insert into qna (userId, qnaTitle, qnaCategory, qnaContent, qnaImage, qnaDate,parents1,parents) values (#{userId}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaCategory}, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaImage}, now(),"1",#{parents})
